ygData.subject: Re: A Lil more oon the duel
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, one more penny. If this is such a tough class of character to play (as I have seen this written), shouldn t we get a benefit for playing that character and
ygData.messageBody:
OK, one more penny.

If this is such a tough class of character to play (as I have seen this
written), shouldn't we get a benefit for playing that character and since we
can't go to that many cities without the KoS worry, such as a paladin elf
class character can (I have never played a paladin elf class, so I maybe
wrong) shouldn't we get some kind of consideration (i.e. bind spell).

OK, now I'm broke.

David
Tenin (DE - lvl 7 - Tarew Marr)


----- Original Message -----
From: Adam Hill <adamthehill@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 2:31 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] A Lil more oon the duel


From: "Adam Hill" <adamthehill@...>

Allright, lets do this in detail.
My guildmate and i had friendly duel. He was a 18th level Halfling Druid I
myslef was a 17th level Dark Elf Shadowknight. He had full leather and a
screaming mace. I had a shiny brass halberd, Full bronze Platemail, 110 str
after siphoning. He rooted me and blasted me with a spell doing 37 pts a
turn and Stinging swarm. I got the joy of casting my three spells at him
until i was un rooted and harm touched him. The harm touch did HALF a bubble
YES HALF. after he was taxed. Now at melee. My halberd was doing about one
to twenty nine pints of damage. at one time in the duel, I did one point of
damage three times in a row. Also, 75% of my spells were laughed off. the
only good thing i did in my fight was dodge and parry quite often(helps to
be a dark elf fer that). Well thats about that. Rather embarrasing and
disheartening. In beta I played a warrior and never lost a battle.
